titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to exempt mental health services furnished to an individual who is a resident of a nursing facility from the limitation on the amount of incurred expenses for mental health services that may be taken into account in determining the amount of payment for such services under part B of the Medicare Program.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5759-5760)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/11/1993--Introduced. Amends part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance) of title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to remove the payment limitation with respect to mental health services furnished to skilled nursing facility residents.
